Introduction Installation

Installation

Create a new Heart.js project with your favorite stack in seconds.

Get started by running a single command. The interactive CLI will guide you through selecting the components you need for your project.

Requirements

Before you begin, make sure you have the following installed:

  • Node.js: Version 18 or higher.
  • Docker: Optional, but required if you plan to use the integrated database services.

Create a New Project

You can create a new Heart.js project using your preferred package manager. The CLI automatically detects and uses the package manager you invoke it with.

Interactive Setup

After running the command, the CLI will prompt you to configure your project. You can name your project and select the components you want to include.

Project Structure

Once the setup is complete, your project will have a clear, multi-package structure. Each part of your application lives in its own directory:
